segments.text: I feel confused by all the diet options out there . I don ’ t know which one actually works .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most of them are not so practical . It will be very bad for your health if you skip lunches or supers as the recommended . I think making an exercise plan can be more effective .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you ’ re right . It is very expensive to go to a weight-loss center . I ’ d better join in a fitness club .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don ’ t need to lose weight , you are not fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bought an exercise dress yesterday and I found it was hard to dress it up .
segments.speaker: S1
